javax.accessibility.Accessible, java.util.EventListener, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.event.ItemListener, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, WizardListener
public class VirtualDatabaseTab
extends WizardTab
implements java.awt.event.ItemListener

This is the general panel for the configuration of the virtual database. It mainly contains pools information
